You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &brvbar

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&brvbar;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a6/index.htm U+000A6].
  * `&brvbar` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a6/index.htm U+000A6].
